column2: #We've also included a table and grouped bar plot below that serves as another alternative manner in which the data can be viewed.
#Grouped Bar Plot Demonstrating a Change in Selected indicators over Time and Space
#total occupied housing units, population, median rent, median household income, and share of renters
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'year'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
unite(year.TOD, year, TOD, sep = ": ", remove = T) %>%
